Title: Setting Up Xiaohongshu Store Backend via Mobile
Content: Setting up your Xiaohongshu store backend via mobile involves several steps. First, download the Xiaohongshu Qianfan system from the app store. Once installed, open the app and navigate to the main page. Here, you can manage customer service notifications, respond to customer inquiries, and handle any violation notices. Next, go to the 'All Tools' section where you can publish products, manage orders, and handle after-sales services. The initial setup includes filling in your store's information and setting up your shipping address. This address can be a placeholder if you are using a dropshipping model. Ensure you also configure your logistics settings, including shipping templates for different regions. Additionally, you can set up marketing tools like coupons and promotional activities. Finally, complete your store's verification by submitting necessary documents and paying the required deposit. This comprehensive setup ensures your store is ready for operation on Xiaohongshu.

Title: Managing Customer Service and Notifications
Content: Managing customer service and notifications is crucial for maintaining a smooth operation on Xiaohongshu. The Qianfan system allows you to handle customer inquiries and notifications efficiently. When you receive a message or notification, it will appear in the 'Messages' section of the app. Here, you can respond to customer questions, address any issues, and manage notifications related to store violations or updates. It's important to stay on top of these notifications to ensure timely responses and maintain a good reputation. Additionally, configuring your customer service settings, such as automated responses and FAQ sections, can help streamline the process. By effectively managing customer service and notifications, you can enhance customer satisfaction and ensure smooth store operations.

Title: Utilizing Marketing Tools and Promotions
Content: Utilizing marketing tools and promotions is essential for driving traffic and sales on Xiaohongshu. The platform offers various promotional tools, including coupons and discount codes. To set up a coupon, navigate to the 'Marketing' section and select 'Create Coupon.' You can create different types of coupons, such as store-wide discounts, product-specific discounts, or new customer coupons. Additionally, you can participate in promotional activities and campaigns to increase your store's visibility. It's important to strategically plan your promotions to align with your sales goals and target audience. Regularly updating your promotional offers and analyzing their performance can help you optimize your marketing strategy. By effectively utilizing these tools, you can attract more customers and boost your sales on Xiaohongshu.
